heading: HB08521
0: AN ACT REQUIRING ALL LOCAL MOVIE PRODUCERS TO PROVIDE ENGLISH SUBTITLES ON AT LEAST ONE (1) OF EVERY FIVE (5) COPIES OF FILMS PRODUCED WHICH ARE INTENDED TO BE SHOWN AND/OR CIRCULATED IN THE MAJOR SHOPPING MALLS AND OTHER PROMINENT CINEMA OUTLETS IN THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC INFORMATION since 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08521
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING ALL LOCAL MOVIE PRODUCERS TO PROVIDE ENGLISH SUBTITLES ON AT LEAST ONE (1) OF EVERY FIVE (5) COPIES OF FILMS PRODUCED WHICH ARE INTENDED TO BE SHOWN AND/OR CIRCULATED IN THE MAJOR SHOPPING MALLS AND OTHER PROMINENT CINEMA OUTLETS IN THE COUNTRY
